inn1.comm: bowls it full straightaway and Warner jams it back to the bowler
on the backfoot and punched to short cover
gets forward and defends
comes forward and drives to short cover again
'bowling' yells Sanga as another ball is defended
bowls it shorter and flatter and he punches it to short cover
quite a bit of movement away from the left hander after pitching, he punches it wide of point
shorter in length and he fends it off to the leftof first slip, Kapugedera is standing a bit wide
touch shorter in length again and he punches it to the on side
Sanga thinks he's nicked it and he throws the ball in the air but the umpire was unmoved! Wade made room and went down the track, no sign of an edge
this time Wade doesn't offer a shot
Sanga has done well to stop four certain wides there, too wide down the leg side
swings it away late and he steers it towards point
gets well forward and jams it back to the bowler
goes back and slaps it straight to cover
gets forward and steers it square of the wicket
floated on middle and leg and he clips it towards midwicket
comes forward and pushes it softly towards cover
Wade decides to use his feet and he ends up clipping wide of square leg, had to really force that away, nice tight start by Dilshan
Sanga goes back to Kula this time, he overpitches and Warner drives through the line, on the up and wide of mid-off, well timed
drifts on the body and he tucks it wide of midwicket
clipped away behind square on the on side for a single
skids through and hits his thigh as he tries to work it away
that's a classic shot! Pitched up and Warner stays at the crease and scoops it through the line and it lands just short of the straight boundary
an appeal for an lbw but it's given as runs, it skidded through and he played it close to the pads and the ball rolled to the off side
flighted on middle and clipped to the on side
defended towards short midwicket and they take a quick single
gets forward and pushes it down to cover, packed off side field there
defended just wide of the bowler
rocks back and slaps it hard but once again can't get it past the off side field
gets forward and clips it wide of square leg
not sure what Warner was trying to do there, he tries to wham it through the on side and ends up getting the inside edge past the stumps, he played it one-handed
gets behind the line and defends to the bowler
drifts on the body and he clips it wide of midwicket
tries to slice it wide of point but Dilshan dives and cuts it off
gets behind the line and knocks it down towards mid-off
makes use of the width and steers it well wide of point
good shot by Warner! Tossed up and he gets the front leg forward, bends his knee and slogs wide of long-on
gets forward and drives wide of mid-off
on the front foot and driven down to cover
drops it short and he can't punch it past cover point
Warner gives the charge and scoops it long over extra cover, that's 12 off the over
drifts on the body and he tucks it to the leg side
nicely punched past extra cover and the fielder does brilliantly to pull the ball back near the rope  and relay it to Jayawardene
gets across and punches it down the track

nicely dabbed away past the keeper, took advantage of the fact that there was no slip, Maharoof does his best to slide and cut it off at third man but there's some doubt if his foot was touching the rope, the third umpire takes a look but it's four
tucks him for room and he steers it to the off side
just opens the face and steers it to square third man
makes use of the width and steers it past that off side field, well placed
fullish on middle and leg and he pushes it down the track
stays back and punches it down towards mid-off
tucks him up for room and he punches it down towards cover point
on the pads and he clips it down towards short fine leg and Malinga fumbles
drives inside out but can't beat extra cover
drifts on the pads and he tucks it to the on side
Warner tries to force it away but maharoof cramps him up for room, clips it to the on side
clips it off his thighs to the leg side
continues on the pads and he works it behind square, not the best effort by Malinga
this time Malinga runs across and manages to stop it properly
bowls it straight again and he works it just wide of mid-on
works it wide of extra cover for a couple
drifts on the pads and he clips it down to fine leg
gets on his knee and paddles it to the leg side
gives it a bit more air and he squeezes it back to the bowler
gets forward and drives through the line down to long-off
flatter delivery and he clips it with the turn to the leg side
fullish on middle and off and he drives down towards long-on
Warner wanted to force that through the on side but he checked his shot and the ball dropped short of the fielder in the region of wide mid-on
he really hoicked that across the line and it was always going to test Herath at deep midwicket, all power in that one
drifts on the pads and he clips it behind square on the on side
drives on the up but straight towards point
Wade gives the charge but he ends up squirting it towards mid-off, challenges the fielder by taking a quick single
makes room and slices it on the up but short of point
comes forward and drives towards cover
drives but can't beat cover point
gently eased away to short square leg
checks his drive down to cover
the batsman gets well forward and forces it past cover
loosener on the off stump and he steers it wide of point
steers it down to third man and they jog the single
bit of an ugly hoick but he manages to place it wide of square leg
comes down the track and he forces it down to long-on, didn't look in control of that one
nicely fielded at short cover and Warner decides against the single

Sri Lanka will be mighty relieved at that because it's Warner! Things get a little tasty as Maharoof walks past the batsman, Maharoof angles it across the left-hander, the batsman gets a thick outside edge and it's well taken by Sanga falling to his left, Maharoof says something to Warner who gives him a stare, it all lasted a couple of seconds
gets forward and gently tucks it to the on side
that was too wide down the leg side, poor ball
pushes it down towards cover point
watchfully leaves it alone to the keeper
squeezes it down towards point
fullish on the off stump and he punches it down towards mid-on
a touch slower and Watson shows the full face and defends towards mid-on
cramps him a bit for room  but Watson adjusts well by opening the face and dabbing it down to third man
short of a length and he cuts well wide of point and Malinga boots it away at third man, he may not be a 100% yet
gets across and quietly defends down the pitch
uses the angle and deftly steers it down to third man
bowls it flatter and Wade rocks back and thumps it to extra cover
well played by Wade! Bit more flight and Wade gets on his knee quickly and sweeps it hard and wide of square leg
clips it down to short fine leg and sets off, the throw was too wide to the keeper
flatter and Watson tries to squeeze that past short third man

had to scamper that single there! Clipped to short midwicket and Wade had to rush, the throw from Jayawardene was too high and Sanga did his best to try and back flick that to the stumps but was wide of the woodwork
clipped behind square for a single
keeps it on the middle and leg line and he clips it to mid-on
gets across and tucks it wide of midwicket for a single
flat and powerful! Vintage Watson as he picks the length early and with great bat speed pulls that flat just over the midwicket rope, Maharoof bowling too short
bowls it fuller on the pads and Watson clips it in the air down to Kapugedera at deep midwicket
works it through the line down to long-on
slower ball and he quietly pushes it back to the bowler
fullish on the stumps and squeezed back to the bowler
full again and he pushes it past Kula to long-on
touch short of a length and he punches it back to the bowler
clipped to long-on and that brings up the 100
full outside the off stump and he capitalises on the width and squeezes it past cover, nicely timed
punches it back to the bowler
lazy elegance! Class from Watson as he gets forward and just scoops it over mid-on, at first it looked he was going to spoon it tamely to the fielder but he got a lot more elevation  than that
tries to slash this through the off side but misses it
clips it in front of midwicket for a single
Wade stands in front of the crease, Malinga digs it in a bit shorter and Wade opens the face and dabs it to third man
short and wide and Malinga is lucky it didn't go for four, it cost half of that, Watson cuts on the up wide of point and Herath picks up at the deep
wide again and Malinga's lucky again, Watson chopped it down to extra cover
makes room and cuts it in front of point
glides it wide of short third man

Herath manages to hang on! Dilshan bowls round the wicket and flat, Watson is on his knee and slogs him, the ball travels quickly and flat and Herath runs to his right at deep midwicket, nearly over-runs the ball but manages to hang on on the dive, the ball could easily have bounced off his hands but he ensure he got his body behind it
gets across and shoulders arms
punches it down towards cover
Herath is inspired! Clipped towards fine leg and Herath slides and pulls it back before the rope
drives inside out towards mid-off and sets off for a quick single
fuller delivery and once again he defends inside out
tucks him for room and he punches it towards mid-off
clips it down to midwicket

direct hit and he's gone! Excellent work by Dilshan there, Wade sliced it down towards short point and wasn't sure about the single, Hussey was off the blocks but Dilshan was too quick for him, picks up and throws flat at the stumps in one motion, just short of his ground and the third umpire takes a look
gets forward and defends
gets forward and steers it to the off side
driven towards cover
Appeal for a stumping! But he's safe, Wade's beaten on the drive outside the off stump but he ensured his back foot was behind the crease, Asad Rauf calls for assistance
stays back and chops it down towards third man
clips it down towards mid-on and it's another decent effort by Dilshan, just 41 off ten overs, job well done
Kula gets it to skid through and beats the batsman
good length on the stumps and he drives to mid-on
gets across and punches it down to mid-off
drifts on the pads and he tucks it towards square leg
close call for Wade as he gets an inside edge which hits his pads, could so easily have dribbled onto the stumps, too close to cut as well
clips it behind square on the on side for a single

can't keep Herath out for too long! Strikes with ball No.1, comes round the wicket, Wade makes room to cut but he ends up getting a thick outside edge, good reflexes nevertheless as he takes it in the second attempt. Good knock by Wade
comes forward and drives towards cover
stays back and defends
gets well forward and defends
comes well forward and clips it to midwicket
drives him down to long-off
tucks him up for room and he chops it down to square third man and the batsmen hurry for the second run and the throw was too high
gives him width and Hussey bends his knee and slices it wide of backward point, Herath runs across from third man and has it covered but fails to pull it back as the ball rolls back to the rope
gets on the front foot and drives to mid-off
bowls it straighter and he punches it down the track
tucked away close to the pads towards long leg and the throw to the keeper is too high
angles it across the right-hander and he leaves it alone to the keeper
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
gets forward and drives back to the bowler
Forrest looked quite flummoxed there! Herath got it to grip and Forrest was looking to drive towards mid-off but the ball spun just a bit and hit the off stump, Forrest playing down the wrong line
comes well forward and defends
driven firmly back to the bowler
good length on the off stump and he punches it towards point
Hussey nearly chopped that onto his stumps, he expected that to bounce a bit more
a bit too straight and he clips him down towards fine leg
gets on the backfoot and pushes it towards point
fullish on the off stump and he drives to sweeper cover
gives him width and he slices him wide of point
floated on middle and off and he drives to the off side
gets well forward and defends
defends inside out back to the bowler
forced past the bowler and Malinga does well to slide at mid-on
plonks forward and defends
flighted slowly and the batsman has time to rock back and clip it to the leg side
slower ball outside the off stump and he steers it softly to the off side
gets an inside edge on the drive to the on side
gets forward and pushes it down towards cover
slower ball and he softly pushes it towards the bowler
gets on the front foot and pushes it back to the bowler
pulls towards deep midwicket for a couple but he doesn't quite time it
tossed up on the leg stump and he clips it down towards midwicket
plonks forward and defends
gets well forward and drives to the off side
tossed up outside off and driven on the up wide of extra cover
gets across and clips it wide of midwicket
punches it off the front foot down towards cover
gets on the front foot and drives towards mid-off
just short of a length and he chops it down towards point
gets across and clips it down to deep midwicket
slower delivery and he gets forward and quietly defends
tries to force it away down to fine leg but the ball hurries on him and hits his body

hits him a touch high but Asad Rauf's convinced! Maharoof gets it to nip back in off the pitch, the ball skids through and hits his thigh but Rauf was convinced with the height, took a few seconds before raising the finger
gets well forward and tucks it to the on side
plonks forward and defends
he's happy to defend this one as well
defends close to the pads and Sanga's a bit excited
flatter delivery and defended
bowls it flat again and he defends
gets it to swing in late and he pushes it towards the off side
gets across and drives him towards mid-off
that sliced him in half and nearly beat the keeper! Gets it to slither inwards off the pitch and beats goes through the gap between bat, pad and sails over the middle stump
swings it back in and he clips it towards square leg
chips down the track and he clips him down towards square leg
tossed up on the off stump and he defends
uses his feet and Christian whips it to the on side but Malinga doesn't get across quick enough to stop it at mid-on
Christian chooses to attack, he uses his feet again to a flighted delivery and chips it high over midwicket
lunges forward and smothers the spin
clips it away down towards midwicket
stays beside the line to point
fullish on middle and leg and pushed down to mid-on
gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
slower delivery, Lee gets well forward and has to check his shot
drifts towards the body and he clips him down towards midwicket
slower ball outside the off stump and he steers it wide of point
good length on middle and off and he defends to the off side
another slower ball and the batsman tries to slash it away but misses, beats the keeper as well
another slower ball and Lee gets a thick leading edge over extra cover, that travelled quite far
makes a bit of room and Lee can only force it down to midwicket
another slower ball and Lee makes room and swings but misses
loses control of that slower delivery and sprays it wide of the off stump
bowls it short of a length and Lee has a free swing of the arms and pulls wide of midwicket
another slower delivery and he clips it off his hips
good length outside off and he uses the width to steer it towards third man
Maharoof strikes again! He continues bowling the slower ball, Christian chips down the track and has to check his shot, ends up spooning it straight to mid-off, Jayawardene takes it
on the off stump and he pushes it back to the bowler
swings it towards the pads and he clips it off his pads to square leg
flicks it away down to midwicket
floated on the pads and he defends to the off side
Lee flicks it down to midwicket
gets on the front foot and defends
flatter delivery, he flicks it down to midwicket
fires the yorker but it's wide of the off stump, he safely leaves it alone
gift for Australia as Malinga misdirects the yorker on the pads and McKay gets some bat on it to send it screeching to fine leg
gets forward and pushes it down towards cover
keeps a bit low and McKay chops it down towards the keeper
fullish on the off stump and he gets across and lofts it crisply over mid-off, just short of the rope
starts off with a full one outside the off stump and he drives on the up down towards short cover
stays beside the line and steers it towards the off side
stays beside the line and angles it wide of point for a single
that's a good yorker honing in on the leg stump, Lee makes a bit of room and can only squeeze it back to the bowler
gets this one to nip back inwards and really squares up the batsman as he tries to cut
full on the off stump and driven down towards mid-off
gets forward and drives towards mid-on
floated on middle and leg and he tucks him wide of square leg
chips down the track and checks his shot
rocks back and chops it down towards point
goes back at the crease and steers him down to third man
slower delivery on the blockhole and he digs it out to the bowler
tries to flick it away but he gets a bottom edge onto the pads
take that! Pitched up on the pads and McKay takes Kula downtown over deep midwcket! Lovely follow through and it goes about 6 rows back
on the blockhole outside off and he fails to dig it out
squeezed out to deep cover
goes back to cut but mis-times it and hits it into the ground near his shoe
chipped in the air but short of the fielder at long-off
defended back to the bowler
charges the bowler and hits the ball past him towards long off
tries to hit inside out over the off side but gets an inside edge that lobs on the leg
played off the front foot through midwicket
fullish in length outside off and he makes room and crashes it to deep extra cover
crashes this one as well off the front foot, Kulasekara dives at the boundary at wide long-off but it was too quick for him, raw power, Malinga not getting the yorker right
makes room and swishes at thin air, wide of the off stump
gets beside the line and cuts hard but can't beat backward point
makes room and crashes it off the front foot but Kulasekara's able to get across and cut it off
slower delivery outside off, he swings and misses
This partnership starting to annoy SL a bit, McKay chips down the track and chips Herath inside out over extra cover, in fact it was more than a chip, clean hit
drives to the man at cover
makes room and he gets the ball to drift inwards and he ends up chopping it to the off side
McKay perishes trying to go over the top on the on side, he gets on his knee for the slog and he ends up hitting it flat to Maharoof at deep midwicket, he falls forward and takes it
tossed up on middle and leg and he whips it towards midwicket
makes room and tries to scoop it over the bowler's head but ends up miscuing it to mid-off
slower ball outside the off stump and he misses and Sanga nearly falls over trying to stop it!
Lee makes room and biffs a full delivery down to long-off, once again Malinga not getting his yorkers through properly, he's not 100% fit they say
opens the face of the bat and steers him down to deep point, a fumble allows a second run
runs it down to third man for a single
Dropped Maharoof thre culprit, the batsman made room and sliced a length delivery down to deep extra cover, it was flat and Maharoof didn't time his dive well
squeezes out a yorker on the leg stump and Kula runs across and flings it back towards the stumps
good yorker again, outside the off stump and he makes room and fails to squeeze it out
makes room and squirts out a yorker to deep point
on the blockhole angling wide of the left-hander and it's too good for Doherty
full on the off stump and he squeezes it out to the off side
lofts over mid-off but not timed as well and it's short of the fielder in the deep
yorker on the pads and he squeezes it out to deep midwicket
another yorker on the pads and he can only squirt it straight to midwicket
squeezes out a yorker to backward point and Dilshan charges at the ball and prevents a single
that's more like it from Malinga, fast yorker outside off and swinging away, can't get bat on ball
squeezes out a yorker to Dilshan at backward point and he has a shy at the bowler's end though Malinga wasn't behind the stumps
swings it to midwicket and risks another single but the throw is wide
Kula bowls it wide of the off stump on seeing Lee make room, slower ball too, Lee misses
knocks off the leg bail! Kula bowls another yorker on the leg stump, Lee makes room to flay that anywhere but the ball hits his boot and shaves the leg stump

not the best start to Lyon's ODI career with the bat! Kulasekara bowls it full on the pads and Lyon makes room and chips it high over midwicket and Senanayake the substitute times the dive well and takes the catch

inn2.comm: makes him play straightaway, Jayawardene gets across and softly taps it to the on side
Jayawardene cannot resist on seeing the width, reaches out and flashes over backward point and Doherty slides at square third man and his foot was close to the rope as he pulled it back
no chance at cutting this off, strays on the leg stump and he clips it off his pads down to fine leg
nicely punched off the meat of the bat down to mid-on, Dilshan has to hurry back
stays back at the crease and defends down the track
classic flick but unlucky not to get a boundary, pitched up on the pads and he easily clips it over midwicket, the fielder gives the chase
one slip in place, he rocks back and punches it to the off side
drops it short and wide and Dilshan gives it a thrash past backward point
gives the charge and pushes it to the off side
gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
chips down the track and tries to mow that past mid-off but can't beat the fielder
forced away, Doherty drifts on middle and leg and Dilshan gets on his knee quickly and hammers it along the ground down to fine leg
Jayawardene shows a lot of intent there by stepping down the pitch and hammering a length ball in front of square, past cover
Jayawardene stays back at the crease and defends, Lee mumbles something to him but Mahela laughs it off
he goes for the chip over midwicket again and he clears the fielder comfortably, turns the face of the bat a bit too much and hence didn't time it as well
full on the pads and he elegantly works it straight to to the deep midwicket fielder
shows the full face of the bat and neatly pushes it to mid-on

soft dismissal! Dilshan tries to turn the face of the bat and work it to the on side but he gets a leading edge that lobs to cover, always a risky proposition if you try and fetch the ball from outside off
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
this one beats him! Nearly takes the outside edge, bit of turn there
floated on the pads and he clips it behind square
sprays it down the leg side as he tries to flick it away
crisply timed cover drive, Doherty tosses it up outside off and he drives well wide of the close-in fielder
turns the face of the bat and clips it to the leg side
almost an action replay of the previous boundary, full and tossed up, he drives past the covers and it speeds away
gets behind the line and defends solidly again
Lee bangs it in short and it sails over the batsman who doesn't offer a shot, he's penalised for it though
hits a good length on the off stump and he defends down the track
fullish on the pads and he clips it down to square leg
another pleasing straight drive, shows the full face and beats mid-off, the straight boundaries are long
gets beside the line and steers him wide of backward point
slower ball on a full length outside the off stump and he pushes it wide of mid-off
fullish in length on the off stump and he pushes it to mid-on
on the pads and elegantly clipped in front of square on the on side, i think it was Forrest who picked it up at the edge of deep midwicket and relayed it to Mike Hussey
slightly slower in pace and he gently tucks it to midwicket
good length outside off and he gets across and pushes it cover
gets across and checks his shot to midwicket
shuffles across and defends with soft hands to the off side
Lee drops it short and Sanga makes him pay for that length, it was quick on the body and he swiveled and clubbed that behind square on the on side

Lee brings Australia right back in! Loose shot by Sangakkara, pitched up outside off and angling away slightly, he half-heartedly drives at it and the edge flies off the toe of the bat and Watson cups it over his head at first slip
gets him on the backfoot straight away to defend
brings up the fifty with a booming cut! Short and wide and it appeared as it third man would mop that up but it was too quick for him, down to deep point
Lee pitches it up and has Chandimal poking forward and the ball sneaks past the face of the bat
cut away again but third man is square enough to cut that off
and now there is a spring in the step. The ball pitches outside the off stump and Chandimal is hit outside the line too. Every fielder in the circle appeals
comes forward and defends it to cover

and there is no escaping the dreaded finger this time around! Fuller ball on the off and middle line. Chandimal leans across and looks to flick it. He misjudges the length and is struck on the  pads.The umpire doesn't waste a second in raising the index finger. Sri Lanka does need the batting depth today
comes forward and pushes it to the off side
on the leg stump. Thirimanne turns it to short fine-leg
comes forward and pushes it to the cover fielder. A maiden over
comes forward and defends a good length ball to cover
fuller ball on the off stump. Jayawardene leans forward and pushes it to mid-on. Exactly the kind of the shot that Chandimal was looking to play
turns it to the leg side for a single
fuller ball outside the off stump. Thirimanne defends it back onto the pitch
fuller ball outside the off stump. Thirimanne drives it to the short cover fielder
good length ball outside the off stump. Thirimanne comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler. A good first over by the captain then
gets across and defends this solidly down the track
drifts on the pads and McKay is lucky the flick didn't beat short fine leg

Australia are on a roll here! McKay deceived him with one that nipped back in from outside the off stump and bowled him through the gate, Jayawardene played down the wrong line and the ball clipped his off stump
full and swinging away and he pushes it softly to the off side
drifts on the pads and he gently clips that down to square leg
drifts on the pads again and he easily works it wide of midwicket
he reaches out to drive a full delivery but checks his chot
he opens the face of the bat and steers him down to point
bangs it in short and he it's a very quick bouncer which he ducks to evade
nicely cut away past backward point, third man picks up
gets across and solidly pushes this one down to short cover
bowls it quick and Tharanga defends solidly
Tharanga gives the charge and luckily for him the ball lands in front of mid-on, not the smartest move
gets forward and tucks it to the on side
drives towards cover and tells his partner to wait
gets his front foot across and defends solidly
flatter this time and he rocks back and punches it wide of extra cover
comes round the wicket and he lands it on a good length, pushes it to the off side
tries to steer it wide of point but Hussey dives and stops it
nips back in off the seam from round the wicket and slices him in half and Wade does well to stop it
close call again as he gets an inside edge on the drive and onto his body
goes back at the crease and defends down the track
angles it on the pads and he closes the face of the bat and works it to midwicket
comes forward and knocks it just wide of short cover
quicker through the air and defended to the off side
can't resist giving the charge but he checks his shot, slower in pace
gets a bit of turn but he stays back and defends
drops it wide of cover but they scamper a single
gets well forward and defends to the off side
full and wide and he flashes at it and clears point, Lyon mops up
stays back and defends to the off side
gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
drifts on the pads and he clips it off his legs to the on side
gets across and softly taps it to the off side
gets across and pushes it firmly towards mid-on
goes back at the crease and cuts him wide of backward point
just about manages to cover the line, the ball rolls the off side
waits for the turn and then stabs it down to point
short and wide and he cuts but the old fox Brett Lee dives at point
gets well forward and drives wide of cover
pushes it just wide of cover point for a single
short and wide outside off and he gets beside the line and places it to third man
fullish in length and he mistimes the drive to the on side
nips back in and he somehow manages to defend it away
steers it towards point and they decide not to take the single
nicely punched on the walk down towards short cover
a touch shorter and a bit wide but he can't squeeze it past the gap at the covers
gets well forward and defends
the leading edge and it just lands short of Lyon!
clips it away close to his pads down to deep square leg
gets forward and paddles it to the on side
comes well forward and drives to the off side
Thirimanne gets on his knee early and sweeps it away to the on side
chops it straight towards point, he tries to bisect that gap
McKay gets him to drive square of the wicket on the off side and he misses it completely, that just missed the edge
on the pads and it runs down to deep square leg
nicely driven on the front foot to beat the diving mid-off fielder, he picks the longer boundary and that allows them to run all four
goes back and pushes it towards extra cover
stays behind the line and defends solidly
been a while coming, he bowls it a fraction short and the batsman rocked back at the crease, made room and cut past point and gully
uses his feet and checks his drive back to the bowler
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
stays back  and clips it against the turn to the on side
comes forward and drives on the up but it was well wide of extra cover, Wade thought there may have been a chance of a catch
gets forward and squeezes it past a diving cover
Lee comes round the wicket and drifts on the body, gently tucked to the on side for a quick single
stays beside the line and taps it in front of square on the off side
Lee bangs it in short and Thirimanne has to fend that off really high on the bat, Lee comes over and has a word with him
just checked his on drive but it was good enough to beat a diving mid-on, mid-off runs across and cuts it off
full outside off and he plays a neat square drive down to sweeper cover
Tharanga ensures he shows the full face of the bat to drive to sweeper cover
drops it down towards short midwicket and takes a quick single
floated on the pads and he clips it down to midwicket
cuts but wide of first slip! Rocks back and there's extra bounce, catches the outside edge and flies past Watson
comes well forward and works it across the line to midwicket
stays back and chops it to the off side
clips it to the left of Lyon who stops it
shuffles and clips it towards midwicket and it brings up the 100, perhaps a lot more laborious than we all expected
reaches out to cut and he gets an inside edge which rolls to the keeper
he ducks under that quick bouncer and the umpire penalises him
nicely punched off the front foot but straight to mid-off
Lee comes from over the wicket and the batsman places it to point, Warner has a shy at the bowler's end but Christian's there to back the throw
stays back at the crease and chops it to the off side
drifts on the pads and he clips it down to deep square leg
slides it down the leg side and it beats the keeper
this one goes through straight and beats the outside edge!
comes forward and smothers the spin
waits for it and pushes it to midwicket
comes forward and plays it wit soft hands
pushed through quicker and he gets well forward and defends
he clips it down towards midwicket
loosener on the off stump and he gets across and knocks it to the on side
angles it on the pads and he clips it to the on side
chips down the track, haven't seen that in a while, he steers it down to third man
stays behind the line and defends down the track
tries to squeeze that past the off side field but can't beat Warner at point
short delivery and he's not afraid to pull, importantly he keeps it along the ground and down to deep midwicket
comes well forward and drives him down to long-on
gets right across his stumps and paddles it to the leg side
close call for Tharanga as he gives the charge and nearly scoops it on the full to Watson at mid-off!
turn this time, he sticks his leg out and pads it away
comes well forward and clips it to the on side
drives to sweeper cover and escapes Nelson
full on the pads and clipped to the on side
full on the pads and he clips it with his legs to deep square leg
fullish on the off stump and he drives him down to mid-off
Thirimanne's resistance comes to an end! Watson pitches it up outside the off stump and Thirimanne can't resist slicing it in the air and it travels low to Warner at point
good length on the off stump and Kapugedera leaves it alone
gives him width and he chops it down hard towards point
driven hard down the track straight to the bowler
stays back and clips it back to the bowler
turns it back in and he works it to the on side
places it to midwicket and takes a single
gets well forward and drives towards cover
clips it straight to midwicket
fullish on the off stump and he steers it down to point
fullish on the off stump and he drives him down to mid-off
gets across and clips him down towards midwicket
stays beside the line and chops it straight towards Warner at point
fullish outside the off stump and he drives him down to sweeper cover
bangs it in short and he bends his knee and evades it
that's a pleasing shot, Tharanga comes down the track and ensured he hit it hard enough to beat extra cover and Hussey has no chance of cutting it off
defends back to the bowler
comes down the track and squirts it back to the bowler
run-out appeal! They take a quick single towards square leg and Kapugedera's dive saved him, Wade whipped off the bails and the 3rd umpire had a look
gets on the front foot and defends back to the bowler
he sweeps but a trifle late, manages to get bat on it
short outside the off stump and he opens the face and runs it down to third man
gets on the front foot and drives towards cover
the slower ball and he places it just wide of cover
opens the face of the bat and steers it down to backward point
nicely placed, just opened the face of the bat and steered it wide of point
Lyon makes the mistake of dropping short again, Tharanga rocks back and cuts wide of cover point, squeezed it past quite a narrow gap, well placed
gets well forward and defends
gets forward and drives just wide of the diving short cover fielder, SL need less than 100 now
gets on the front foot and drives to long-off
some turn for Lyon, he gets forward and  defends to the on side
gets on the front foot and defends
sharp bouncer from Christian, had Tharanga ducking under that one
gets on the front foot and drives him to cover
angles it on the pads and he clips it down towards midwicket
sliced towards point and a slight blooper from Warner as he slips after collecting the ball
stays beside the line and slices it down to cover point
tries to force the pace after five dot balls and he ends up slicing it to Warner again
gets well forward and defends to the off side
chips down the track and drives to long-off
flighted on middle and he drives him down to long-off
Kapugedera doesn't mind using his feet, he forces this down to long-on
worked wide of mid-on for a quick single
gets well forward and knocks it to the leg side
gets across and clips it with soft hands to the on side
plays it late and cuts quite close to the body, places it straight to point
Tharanga's doing the right thing by keeping it along the ground, he squirts it out to deep cover
that's a very good yorker from Christian and he had Kapugedera in a tangle as he squirted that out
squeezes out a tight yorker outside off and it was well fielded by point
nips back in and skids off the pitch and he gets an inside edge
McKay really tucks him up for room, on middle stump and all he can do is knock it down the pitch
this time he beats him outside the off stump, Tharanga tries to run it down to third man
SL will want more of those, half volley on the pads and the ball clipped his pads and raced past short fine leg

that's another failure for Kapugedera and Australia edge closer! There was no room for the batsman to steer it to the off side and he ended up getting a thick edge that was taken neatly by Wade falling to his right
Kula gets across the stumps and clips it to the on side for a single
fullish on middle and leg and he digs it out to mid-on
Kula's not going to waste too much time, the ball it pitched up on middle and off and he has the room to bash that down the pitch and past mid-on
tries to repeat that through the off side and this time mid-on runs across and gets a hand to it and parries it to the deep on the off side
squeezes out a full down towards point
Tharanga goes over the infield! Pitched up on middle and off and he clips over midwicket, pretty effortless, the field is up
forces a full delivery wide of mid-off for a single, 12 from the over
drifts on the pads and he works him behind square on the on side and they race through for a couple
fired in on the pads and Tharanga gets to his fifty with a single to the leg side, it's been a very hardworking knock. Rewarding? Let's wait and see
good slower ball and Kula wisely keeps it out by clipping it to the on side for a single
well bowled by McKay, round the wicket and he doesn't give him the space to hit, all he can do is quiet;y tuck it back to the bowler
full on middle and leg and he mows it along the ground to square leg
looked like another slower one which had Kula is a moment of anxiety, he wanted to force it down the ground  but checked his shot and ended up spooning it to safety at cover
shots like this will get that dug out on their feet! He fearlessly makes room outside off and biffs a square drive that bisects the gap between cover point and cover
big lapse from Lee as he sprays this one wide down the leg side and beats the diving Wade, can't blame the keeper at all
good yorker by Lee and well dug out by Kula to the on side, they scamper the single
Tharanga gets some awkward bounce there, he wasn't quick enough to get his arm out of the way as the ball dribbled to the leg side
makes room and plays another spanking square drive but straight to extra cover

Kula's cameo comes to an end! He makes room to mow Lee over the on side, Lee follows him and fires it full wide of the leg stump and he can only scoop it down to mid-on, easily taken at the edge of the ring
full on middle and leg and he forces it down to midwicket
chance for Tharanga to send that down to fine leg but he ends up hitting it with his glove, the keeper collects it
good length on the stumps and he knocks it to the off side
once again he's cramped for room as he stays back and knocks it back to the bowler
gets behind the line and clips it to mid-on, the Powerplay's coming to an end
stays beside the line and  steers it to the off side
cramps him for room and all he can do is knock it back to the bowler
gets beside the line and he punches it towards sweeper cover
Christian does well to cramp him up again, knocked back to the bowler
bangs it in short and Tharanga waits in hope for the wide call but the umpire doesn't budge
steers it to the sweeper square on the off side and they push the second run, the throw was wide
he opens the face and runs it down to third man
excellent running as it puts pressure on the fielder, he softly knocks it towards long-on and takes the first run quickly
well well! Tharanga gives him the charge and lofts him crisply over extra cover, just clears the rope
pushes it firmly to the off side
run-out chance! He makes room and chops it to the off side, the fielder at cover point fires the throw at the bowler's end on seeing Maharoof struggle, Doherty fails to cover it
clips it down towards midwicket for a single
Tharanga gets a bit of width outside the off stump and he ends up chopping it to the off side
slices it just wide of cover point for a single
half volley on the pads and he clips it straight to midwicket
fullish on the pads and he clips it down to mid-on and a fumble allows a single
Tharanga chops it down to sweeper cover
nicely clipped off the pads and Maharoof takes a single to wide long-on
makes room and chops it towards cover point and Hussey fumbles, the nerves are getting to everyone
full and wide outside off and driven safely to sweeper cover
and shots like that make it easier....floated on  middle and leg and he sweeps hard and along the turf behind square on the on side, the fielder had no chance
driven firmly but well stopped by Mike Hussey at cover
driven down the track and the bowler shows good commitment by stopping it
he drills this one wide of the bowler, down to long-on
it's short of a length and Maharoof pulls and he times it well but Lyon does well at deep square leg to cut it off
good running! He drops it with soft hands down to cover and sets off, fielders on their toes
Maharoof also does the sensible thing by dropping it to the off side for a quick single, good backing up for the throw
a dot ball! Christian fires a yorker outside off and Tharanga can't squeeze it out
full on middle and leg and he clips it to square leg
crisp straight drive but Christian takes some miles off the ball, saved at least two there
nice punchy drive off the front foot but straight to short cover
stays beside the line and squirts it wide of sweeper cover
Maharoof misses a boundary opportunity! Drifts on the pads and the ball clips his pads and dribbles to the keeper
swing and a miss and Maharoof plays out another dot ball
doesn't try anything brave this time, decides to punch this down the ground to long-on
big relief for Australia! Angles it close to the off stump and Tharanga tries to drive and gets a thick outside edge and Wade takes the catch low, the captain himself gets the vital breakthrough
slower ball and a touch short and Maharoof thinks of clubbing it away and ends up flat batting it down the track
Herath shuffles across his stumps to work that away but the ball clips his pads and dribbles down the track
Australia are one more death rattle away from the Cup! Herath decides to go for broke over the on side, swings and the ball pegs back the off stump from round the wicket
the slower ball and Malinga nearly spoons it to the keeper! We've seen so many slower ones today
chipped in the air as he tries to work it to the on side, Sri Lanka live to fight another delivery
short and pulled and there are two fielders patrolling the deep on the on side to pick that up, Australia really applying the choke
Maharoof takes a bit off his bat, literally! He tries to dig out a full delivery and jams the ball on the pitch, a big chunk off the toe of the bat goes flying
makes room to slam that away and he ends up mowing it along the ground to long-on
the yorker outside the off stump is too good for Malinga to dig out
steps down the track and tries to hoick it over the on side and he ends up mistiming it
another desperate heave and Maharoof can only just beats the bowler
pounced down towards long-on but Maharoof refuses the single
Maharoof makes room and slams a length delivery straight to sweeper cover, not much pace on the ball to work with
Malinga's chopping wood but making no contact, these slower balls are annoying the batsmen no end
he made contact this time and good one too! Swings this one past square leg and it beats the man in the deep, raw power
that slower ball again! Ever considered walking down the track? Swish and yet another miss

McKay hits the timber, he takes five and Australia take the CB Series! He bowls it full and straight on the stumps, Malinga exposes all three of them, fails to get his bat down and the ball hits the middle stump
